text: DON'T MISS 'This is so embarrassing!' Ferne McCann is left red-faced after suffering from bowel problems during double date with 'man of her dreams' on Celebs Go Dating Pregnant Amal Clooney outshines husband George as she displays her growing baby bump in sweeping ballgown at the Cesar Film Awards Blooming marvellous Khloe Kardashian and new boyfriend Tristan Thompson proudly show off their love (and amazing beach bodies!) on romantic getaway Wowzers! A chip off the old block! But insists all is fine 'as long as it stays in the family' Jamie O'Hara fuels pregnancy rumours as he tweets about looking for a bigger car... after girlfriend Elizabeth Jayne Tierney hints they'll have a baby 'There's no bitterness': Louis Tomlinson gushes about his One Direction bandmates as he praises their support for his first solo performance 'Love trumps hate, courage trumps fear and always-right trumps wrongs': George Clooney bashes Trump at France's César Awards Body of work! Kate Hudson bares extremely toned abs in mustard yellow crop top at ICG Publicists Awards Not afraid of flashing a little flesh Mama's boy! Kim Kardashian the queen of social media attempts to teach son Saint how to pose for Snapchat filters Certainly feeling snap happy once again Naomi Campbell steals the front row show in ravishing royal blue dress at Versace MFW runway presentation She looked sexy and sensational in blue Make-up free Pixie Geldof displays her unique hipster style as she steps out for indie theatre premiere at Trafalgar Studios Known for laid back style Ex Emmerdale star Leah Bracknell appears frail just four months after revealing she has terminal cancer Appeared on Loose Women O-la la! Chloe Ferry shares video of herself PASSING WIND in the bath... in an attempt to cheer up newly-single Marnie Simpson Specs on the Beach! Charlotte Dawson wows in figure-hugging jumpsuit as she sports eighties-inspired corkscrew curls and sexy glasses for gig 'It popped clean out!' Spencer Matthews is the latest contestant to injure himself during The Jump as he SCREAMS in agony after dislocating shoulder in rehearsals So nice, she wore it twice! Emily Ratajkowski wears same khaki green jacket she wore in Milan as she steps out in LA She's had a rough week License to thrill! Former Bond girl Monica Bellucci, 53, shows off her age-defying figure in sexy low cut gown as she attends Belgrade film festival Kendall Jenner flashes her toned stomach and figure beneath chunky athletic coat to storm the catwalk beside best pal Gigi Hadid in Versace's MFW show James Corden spoofs boy bands in Thr33way bit featuring Jordan Peele and Nick Kroll The Carpool Karaoke funnyman unveiled his latest comedic creation 'I will be his wife!': Charlotte Crosby claims she will MARRY Stephen Bear in quickly deleted Tweet... as romance rumours continue to swirl Raised in a two-bedroom council flat by a single mother, now Naomie Harris is tipped for a gong at the Oscars Mum had Post Office job Not one to blend in! Scarlett Moffatt is all smiles as she exits ITV studios in trendy camouflage coat... as she's blasted for 'ending her parents' TV career' 'She still loves me': Lewis Bloor hints that he and Marnie Simpson have reconciled as he slams Aaron Chalmers following claims he 'sponged £25k off her' Sam Reece looks hunky for fashion launch in Liverpool... after slamming ex Stephanie Davis by questioning her 'loyalties' after reuniting with Jeremy McConnell A romantic Weeknd away? Selena Gomez 'jets to the Netherlands to be with her rumoured beau during the European leg of his world tour' 'Don't spray me I'm FAKE': Victoria's Secret beauty Shanina Shaik sports a faux shearling coat emblazoned with suggestive wording as she keeps warm after a workout in California When will Michelle be extradited for being a paedophile? And is Ian Beale pregnant? The week in Walford on EastEnders, by JIM SHELLEY Why do only films about worthy issues (or Tinseltown itself) win Oscars? Most have been deliberately constructed to win, says DAMIAN THOMPSON Slimline Tina Malone flaunts svelte frame in tiger-print jumpsuit at fashion lunch in Liverpool... after dropping a huge NINE dress sizes 'I struggled with self doubt': Pregnant Cheryl reflects on her battle with self-esteem... as fans speculate whether she could ALREADY have given birth Chloe Madeley flaunts her incredible gym-honed figure and sculpted derriere in a silk bra and suspenders for steamy lingerie shoot Mum's the word for Victoria: Jenna Coleman portrays a 'working mother' in Christening scene as second series of ITV's hit royal drama begins filming 'I don't want to be part of those lies': Corrie's Jennie McAlpine slams previous reports of 'wishing' for gastric band surgery and refuses to be airbrushed 'I've tried to move past it': Love Island's Rachel Fenton reveals she's forgiven boyfriend Rykard Jenkins for sleeping with co-star Olivia Buckland An ABS-olutely amazing interview! Cindy Crawford's model daughter Kaia Gerber, 15, shows off her athletic abilities answers 20 questions 'You work hard but don't have much talent!' Eamonn Holmes makes constant digs at Ant & Dec on This Morning on the eve of Saturday Night Takeaway's return EXCLUSIVE: 'Things are about to get very exciting!': Sam Faiers 'set to sign a deal with top US TV network so she can expand her career globally' Lauren Pope flaunts her killer abs and ample cleavage in barely-there white lingerie... as provocatively posing in racy swimsuit Another steamy shot Lily-Rose Depp dazzles in waist-cinching sequin mini dress as she arrives ahead of the 42nd Cesar Awards in Paris Commanded attention Looking tasty in the Big Apple! Jesy Nelson quickly goes from drab to fab as she swaps baggy travel attire for ab-baring bralet hours after NYC arrival Will Tom Hardy's character live happily ever after - with his sister? 10 questions we want answering from the series finale of Taboo, by JIM SHELLEY Charlotte McKinney stuns in sexy blazer suit as she shows off a hint of tummy at the Net-a-Porter pre-Oscars lunch She looked absolutely stunning Emma Watson is the picture of elegance in a stomach-baring jumpsuit as she cosies up to co-star Dan Stevens at Beauty And The Beast photocall Now that's relaxed! Maxwell showcases her model curves in figure-flaunting mesh dress for Versace AW17 Milan Fashion Week presentation SEBASTIAN SHAKESPEARE: Pippa Middleton plans a bridal BIKINI with her sister Kate's swimwear designer Famously figure-hugging 'It's a glorious day!' Britney Spears shows off impressive yoga skills while performing a handstand Showed her many fans some tricky moves Heating up the beach! 'We've got a really, really solid normal life': Nicole Kidman gushes about domestic bliss in Nashville with Keith Urban and daughters Positively gushing Toned tum! Alessandra Ambrosio shows off her supermodel figure in chic sports bra as she heads to a workout Showed off her gym results in capri leggings Malin Akerman flashes cleavage at Kari Feinstein's Pre-Oscar Style Lounge in Los Angeles The Andaz Hotel in Los Angeles played host Catwalk comeback! Behati Prinsloo displays her incredible post-baby body in triumphant return to the runway in a pin-flaunting mini dress during Versace MFW Pregnant Danielle Lloyd flaunts her curves in sizzling Gothic-inspired fashion shoot... after blocking ex Jamie O'Hara from seeing their sons Hand-in-hand! Ian McShane slams Game Of Thrones fans for being too obsessed with the show and suggests they 'get out more' Here we go again! That will make jaws drop!
